summary: Lester is a clumsy and awkward TV repair man who is nevertheless gifted technically. In helping out a friend, he is drawn into a mystery involving a missing heir in a rich family. He begins... See full summary »
cast: Jerry Lewis|Joan O'Brien|Zachary Scott|Jack Weston|Jesse White|Mae Questel|Pat Dahl|Barbara Pepper|Francine York|Milton Frome|Del Moore|Ted de Corsia|Murray Alper|Francesca Bellini|Gary Lewis|Alberto Morin|Julie Parrish|Michael Ross|Doodles Weaver|Dick Whittinghill
title: ¿Qué me importa el dinero?
